Metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6708 affecting package slf4j for versions less than 2.0.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2012-6708 affecting package slf4j for versions less than 2.0.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package slf4j is earlier than 2.0.7-1, affected by CVE-2012-6708
